00036 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 // Function: undo()
00038 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 void SWComponentPacketizeCommand::undo()
00040 {
00041     // Set an empty VLNV.
00042     component_->componentModel()->setVlnv(VLNV());
00043     component_->updateComponent();
00044 }
00045 
00046 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 // Function: redo()
00048 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 void SWComponentPacketizeCommand::redo()
00050 {
00051     component_->componentModel()->setVlnv(vlnv_);
00052     component_->updateComponent();
00053 }
